With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 7
programme.desc: Magloire crosses France but also Canada, Switzerland and Belgium. A journey to spotlight unknown stories, discover the challenges that these French-speakers established around the world face when they leave their country of origin, the accepted sacrifices and the hopes that keep them going.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Sur La Route Des Vins Du Nord
programme.desc: Maximilien de Wazieres is a farmer in the Hauts-de-France region. Today, like others before him, he wants to become a winegrower. Crazy? No. In recent years global warming and changes to European regulations have dealt him a new hand: it is now possible to sell wine made in the Nord.

programme.title: C'est Plus Qu'un Jardin - EP 1
programme.desc: Veronique Claveau and Bryan Audet begin the adventure of growing their own food, with plenty of advice from edith and Dany. The latter also discover where the Sacres-Coeurs de Saint-Bruno Academy school is planning to create its future educational garden.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 5
programme.desc: A voyage of discovery to explore the mills of Auvergne, between the regions of Margeride and Livradois, deep in the heart of the Massif Central.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1507
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Grand Move - EP 7
programme.desc: Caroline, David and their two teenagers leave Trois-Rivieres to start over from scratch in Matane, Gaspe Peninsula.

programme.title: Jean Renard, Une Etoile De L'ombre
programme.desc: 120 million records sold, 1,200 compositions, 69 hits... A portrait of Jean Renard, for whom every sound is a musical note. The French composer recounts his unique life and career, or how his life changed forever on the day he presented Sylvie Vartan with a song for Johnny Hallyday.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 7
programme.desc: A journey through the world of the not so humble stew. Chantal Lamarre shows off her Irish roots with an Irish stew, whilst Joanne Chery prepares a goat fricassee, and we explore the flavour of North Africa with Arik de Vienne.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Grand Move - EP 7
programme.desc: Caroline, David and their two teenagers leave Trois-Rivieres to start over from scratch in Matane, Gaspe Peninsula.

programme.title: La Cabane A Histoires - EP 8
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: La Cabane A Histoires - EP 9
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 32
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 47
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Droles D'oiseaux
programme.desc: Ellie, aged ten and a half, is mad about birds. One day, she must urgently return a book to the school library, which is closed. Ellie decides to take it to Anna, the librarian, who lives on an island on the Loire, not far away. An island full of birds...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024 - EP 62
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Experience Yukon - EP 4
programme.desc: The families get together at the camp in Twin Lake, thus opening a new chapter of their adventure. But being together doesn't necessary mean being united as a tribe. Sharing learning and everyday activities changes the dynamics of the group, despite the reluctance and difficulties experienced by Marcel and Patricia.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Super Bourres
programme.desc: It's the final day of high school. Janus and Sam have to provide the drinks for the end-of-year party. Searching through the contents of Janus's father's cellar in search of a few bottles, they discover a strange machine...

programme.title: Il Etait Une Fois Votre Tv
programme.desc: Jonas Schneiter is celebrating the 70th anniversary of Television suisse romande. This is the opportunity to watch outstanding images and personalities again from French-speaking Swiss television from yesterday and today. On the programme: emblematic sequences, memories, laughter and emotion, under the eye of a new generation of viewers.

programme.desc: The Vendée Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Amanda Lino vs. Manon Fiorot
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features Amanda "MadDog" Lino vs. Manon Fiorot from EFC 83 in Pretoria, South Africa.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Carlos Manuel Baldomir vs. Arturo Gatti
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Carlos Manuel Baldomir, aka 'Tata' (42-9, 12 KOs) vs. Arturo 'Thunder' Gatti (40-7, 31 KOs) in a bout to unify the WBC and IBA titles. The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 22, 2006.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Luis Tavares vs Fatih Ulusoy
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! From Abu Dhabi, UAE, this episode features two-division Enfusion champion Luis Tavares (the Netherlands) vs. Fatih 'The Ottoman' Ulusoy (Turkey).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Nishikigi, Hokotofuji, Takakeisho and Ichinojo from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Lamont Peterson vs. Amir Khan
programme.desc: Lamont Peterson takes on Amir Khan in a bout with a controversial ending, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Aoiyama, Endo, Takakeisho and Tamawashi from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 12: Kerala, India - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kalarippayattu and the Martial Art of Sword, Shield, Sticks, Open Hand and Kicks with Master Sureshan Nambiar.

programme.title: FS MMA Ante Delija vs. Oli Thompson
programme.desc: In this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we take you to action from KSW in Zagreb, Croatia, when local heavyweight Ante Delija from Dubrovnik takes on Oli "The Spartan" Thompson of East Sussex, England. The massive Delija, standing 6'5" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

The massive Delija, standing 6'5" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

programme.title: WCCB Carlos Ocampo vs. Mikael Zewski
programme.desc: From the Colisee in Quebec, Canada, Mikael Zewski competes in front of his hometown fans against world-ranked veteran Carlos Ocampo of Mexico, with the WBC Continental Americas Super Welterweight Title on the line. Ocampo is a tough competitor, taking on the best in the world including Errol Spence Jr. for the IBF Welterweight World Championship. Zewski is also no stranger to the big stage, having held several North American and International WBA, IBF, and WBO titles himself.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Marco Antonio Barrera
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of multiple-weight world champions, as Juan Manuel Marquez challenges Marco Antonio Barrera for the WBC super featherweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ikioi, Endo and Yutakayama from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 4
programme.desc: Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 6
programme.desc: When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 7
programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 8
programme.desc: King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 10
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 24
programme.desc: The Squirrels hear a strange sound that they've not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 26
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 28
programme.desc: After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 29
programme.desc: As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 30
programme.desc: Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 34
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 38
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 39
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 40
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 7
programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Squirrels and Duggee go looking for a special leaf, but find something surprising!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 106
programme.desc: Laa‐Laa has fun counting to three; 1, 2, 3 rabbits, 1, 2, 3 flowers and 1, 2, 3 trees! Laa-Laa even counts three Teletubbies; Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'rocket' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt. But when Zip becomes unsure about the clues, will the friends still get their magical fairy tale prize?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 19
programme.desc: Messy is exploring science questions. He joins his friends in OKIDO on an adventure. They explore the electrical world of circuits to fix Zoe's communicator.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 18
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 19
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 4

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Mum must get Bluey and Bingo out the door in time for a playdate, but they can't leave before they finish their game - waiting for a sticky rubber gecko to drop from the ceiling.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures (S1) - EP 3

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S2) - EP 19
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about wild flower meadows.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 12
programme.desc: Captain Captain has been checking out all the latest looks in her Perfectly Pirate magazine. Sandy and Seaweed aren't dressing up to Captain Captain's high standards so Seaweed suggests a competition!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 40
programme.desc: The Squirrels need some training to improve their concentration.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 38
programme.desc: It's bridge building time... the squirrels help a quarreling group of Gerbils.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: Duggee hosts a Buddy Bonanza for Mrs Weaver and the Squirrels.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 38
programme.desc: How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xuli's treasured 'Academy Ace' flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: The seals are sheltering from the storm, but the seagulls are being a bit rude.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Dog and Pug escape a very noisy Bookshop to find Granny Pug who is leading a mediation retreat. They are trying to find a peaceful spot.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: When Jimmy Jones falls asleep doing some cloud-gazing, Monty wonders what animals dream about.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: When JoJo learns that Jared was too busy to have a birthday party, Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan to throw Jared a surprise belated birthday party!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 16
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 17
programme.desc: Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Café in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.desc: As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 2
programme.desc: Snail is thrilled to be moving house as she wishes to escape the wet and sploshy place she currently calls home to a more spacious house on the hill.

programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch gets his hands on a G.O. Force, the forecast isn't good for the Tarbela Dam in Pakistan.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's Strawberry, who used to be insecure, but now can't wait to celebrate herself and sing her song, See the Seeds!

It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 36
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 51
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 52
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 53
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 54
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 55
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 56
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control"… or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 57
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 58
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 59
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 60
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 61
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 62
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 63
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town’s faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 64
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 65
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 66
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a "Space Race", competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend "moon landing" for a baby - a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 67
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling "Adult Babies" before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 68
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 69
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict "no-babies" policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 70
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 71
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 72
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 73
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 74
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits’ attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 75
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.desc: Arnold and Kay have been married for 30 years, and have drifted apart. To save their marriage, they attend an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

programme.title: Cnbc Tech: The Edge
programme.desc: CNBC Tech: The Edge explores the limitless potential of innovation: From how new products and ideas will shape our lives to the long-term investment opportunity that’ll bring high yield returns.

programme.title: The Cnbc Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. programme.title: Cnbc Tech: The Edge

programme.title: The Cnbc Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: Cities Of Success
programme.desc: The pandemic and the success of startup culture have sparked the emergence of new hubs for businesses outside of traditional power centers of New York, Chicago, Houston and San Francisco. These Cities of Success each have used unique characteristics - pop culture influence, clusters of great universities, friendly geography or forward-thinking local governments - to attract major companies and nurture an entrepreneurial community around them.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Asia Street Signs
programme.desc: Anchored by Tanvir Gill at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Street Signs" follows the day's biggest moves to provide CNBC's audience with actionable, real-time insights. From the anchor desk to trading desks around the region, "Street Signs" helps viewers capitalize on the plays of the day.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: CNBC’s Christine Tan has been talking to the people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia Pacific region for over twenty years in this ground-breaking show.

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: First Class

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Animal Keeper
programme.desc: A program that contains the daily lives of animal handlers tigers, lions, snakes, bears, elephants, crocodiles and leopards packed with entertaining education.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour S4
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Finding Dish
programme.desc: Program contains light information about the world of health and food combining

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.title: Apose S1
programme.desc: APOSE: ANAK PODCAST SEJATI tells the story of a podcaster's work life both on air and behind the scenes. In this series, there is a star podcaster who will interview a number of sources who will be present at the office.

programme.title: Sharing Seassion Music
programme.desc: Digital talkshow with musical performances from Indonesian musicians. This program talks about current project of the guests .

programme.title: Date With Nature
programme.desc: The series consists of 10 dating episodes with unique natural phenomena. The series was created on the basis of materials filmed by the team of the TV channels "Wild Nature HD" and "Home 4K". Filming was carried out in more than 350 locations around the world for 8 years.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Razor

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 5
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 12
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: Unchained Love - EP 1
programme.desc: During the reign of Long Hua, Xiao Duo, a powerful eunuch in charge of the imperial court, plans a palace mutiny with the help of a tribute lady Bu Yinlou. What is the fate between the two?

programme.title: A Female Student Arrives at the Imperial College - EP 9
programme.desc: Story of the only daughter of the Grand Marshal, Sang Qi, who becomes the only female student at the Imperial College.

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 3
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 4
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.title: Good Partner - EP 9
programme.desc: The story follows popular divorce lawyer Cha Eun-Kyung (Jang Na-ra), who finds herself faced with her own marital crisis. She often clashes with rookie lawyer Han Yoo-Ri (Nam Ji-Hyun) over cases. A workplace battle between the two lawyers is about to unfold.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 5
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 9
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Hilarious Family - EP 20
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1852
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 524
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Big Biz Duel - EP 4
programme.desc: Chairman Chiu Hai (Moses Chan) of Saidoi Logistics adheres to a people-first philosophy. With the support of his ex-wife Sand partner, he drives the company's return to the stock market. However, as capital forces become involved, hidden tensions rise.

programme.title: Are You The One - EP 34
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 78
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Missing You - EP 1
programme.desc: A Tracing Services Organization established its service to exclusively assist individuals to locate their missing family members who have been separated due to wars, natural disasters, relocation or other exceptional family circumstances. The members of the organization include stubborn and paranoid HONG YU-FUNG (Linda Chung), zealous optimist SZE YIK-HIM (Jason Chan), glib-tongued SIN KIT-CHING (Cilla Kung) and computer expert YEUNG TSZ-KEI (Calvin Chan).

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 29
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 37
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 37
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 38
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Family - EP 1
programme.desc: When MAN TAI LOI’s (CHUNG KING FAI) eldest grandson FREEMAN (LAU HOI WAI, HAWICK) decides to become a singer, LOI is the only one who opposes it. However, he feels that his influence in the family has declined since his retirement, so he decides not to insist on his opinions. _x000D__x000D_ LOI’s son CHIU KIT (HA YU) is suddenly elevated to the head of the family. KIT used to be looked down upon by other family members.

programme.title: Wonder Women - EP 1
programme.desc: LAM FEI (Miriam Yeung) is a beautiful, trendy yet cheerful "Wonder Women" housewife. She and her husband, an architect SHEUNG KIM-HUNG (Raymond Wong) and a smart and active son SHEUNG KAI-KAI are living a happy life. LAM FEI has two buddies, a career woman, MAN FUNG-WAH (Alice Chan) and a pretty and wealthy wife MA SEE-LUI (Rebecca Zhu). Each of this trio has her own ideas about romance and encounter different up and down of love. KIM-HUNG develops his career.

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 21
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Seventh Day, The - EP 7
programme.desc: The tale begins on the seventh of August, when WING and YAN first encounter their own dream girl on the island. WING works as a lifeguard on the outlying island. He gets to know pet shop assistant LING KA-YAN (CHOW LAI KI, NIKI) by chance and is soon mesmerized by her endearing personality. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 15
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 16
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force.
